Source.Name: yubikey-personalization
Source.Summary: A library and command line tool used to personalize YubiKeys.
Source.Description: The YubiKey Personalization package contains a library and command line tool used to personalize (i.e., set a AES key) YubiKeys.

Package.Name: yubikey-personalization-devel
Package.Description: The YubiKey Personalization package contains a library and command line tool used to personalize (i.e., set a AES key) YubiKeys.
